javelin.controller.upgrade

Class Spell

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.upgrade.Upgrade
      • javelin.controller.upgrade.Spell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Blink, DayLight, DeeperDarkness, Doom, HoldMonster, Ray, Summon

    public abstract class Spell
extends Upgrade
implements Cloneable
    Represents a spell-like ability. See the d20 SRD for more info.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • showleft

      • calculatesavetarget

        public abstract int calculatesavetarget(Combatant caster,
                                        Combatant target)
        Returns:
        Integer.MAX_VALUE if it's an impossible roll; negative Integer.MAX_VALUE in case of an automatic success; or the minimum number needed to roll on a d20 for a successful saving throw. With the exceptions above numbers will be approximated into the range: ]2,19] to allow the ensuing roll of 1 to always be an automatic miss and 20 an automatic hit.

      • castpeacefully

        public abstract java.lang.String castpeacefully(Combatant caster,
                                                Combatant combatant)
                                         throws NotPeaceful
        Throws:
        NotPeaceful - if should not be used out of combat.
